actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Sho Vin Chan, Chung Mok Heung Chan, Luiza Sho Ving Chan, David Sho Ving Chan, and Steven Sho Ving Chan.

summary.text: Declares a certain individual lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, under the Immigration and Nationality Act. Declares a specified provision of such Act inapplicable to four other individuals.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Sho Vin Chan, Chung Mok Heung Chan, Luiza Sho Ving Chan, David Sho Ving Chan, and Steven Sho Ving Chan.
